content:
Hi @Nagesh Bashyam !

Just following up on the question I had in the meeting. I see in the agenda that this scenario is related to hepatitis. I think we have sample content that could work with the eCR Now app (assuming the PlanDefinition changes we've discussed out of band are complete) in the same scenario from Chlamydia reporting. I'll have to look at the existing scenario content to see if there's a way to integrate some of the rule processing logic.

Where is the current content posted so that I can take look?

Also, who's the person in charge of running that particular scenario so that we can discuss the potential for integrating rule filtering into the demo directly?

JP
The PlanDefinition changes are still in progress, the CQL integration is in-progress and will not be ready in time for the Connectathon.Happy to jump on a call to discuss tomorrow afternoon. Will 3pm ET work ?

All of the content is posted on the confluence page including the test data.
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104578142
